data.markdown:
Our Expertise is  
Your Advantage.
==================================

Your partner for buying, selling, leasing, and managing commercial real estate across Oklahoma and Arkansas.

[Explore Listings](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/commercial-listings)
[Work With Us](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

A local leader in commercial real estate
----------------------------------------

Founded in Tulsa in 2008, McGraw Commercial Properties (MCP) is a trusted, full-service commercial real estate firm serving Oklahoma and Northwest Arkansas.  
  
Driven by an innovative, entrepreneurial spirit and collaborative “we” culture, MCP delivers results that align with your goals. With local market knowledge and a personalized, high-touch approach, you’ll have a whole team on your side.

[Let's Talk](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/6887f290995470e11df400c4_mcp-team.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/67633ce6c182ece18684770f_A%20Local%20Leader%202.webp)

Comprehensive Services
----------------------

[Leasing Services](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0)
[Investment Sales](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1)
[Property Management](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)

Whether you’re a tenant seeking the right space or a landlord optimizing property performance, MCP’s leasing services team is here to support you. We offer market expertise and strategic insights to secure the best outcomes—ensuring that you’re represented by an advocate who understands your needs and puts your success first.

[Leasing Services](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/leasing-services)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/677202ea29f082f1f56f2d0c_leasing-services.webp)

Whether buying or selling, MCP’s investment sales team combines market insight with financial expertise to deliver value-driven solutions. We’re here to help you realize the potential of every commercial investment.

[Investment Sales](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-investment)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/67633d2c5702fe3436172e62_Comprehensive%20Services%202.webp)

Our experienced team manages a diverse portfolio, delivering tailored solutions that meet each client’s ownership objectives. We offer flexible, customized property management solutions that fit the unique needs of our clients.  Our ability to scale both our level of service and pricing delivers meaningful value to both clients and tenants.

[Property Management](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-property-management)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/675a6cfbb4350bc581a6e765_service-pm.webp)

Expertise Across All Property Types
-----------------------------------

MCP brings unmatched local knowledge across all commercial property types, guiding you with the honesty of a friend and the tenacity of an expert.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/675b29a76e7d9c2767a6066f_multifamily1200.webp)\
\
#### Multifamily\
\
Our multifamily investment team is equipped with the resources, local expertise, and a broad network of owners and investors to guide you through a successful transaction.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-multifamily)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/675b29af6d0125f22247fc98_retail1200.webp)\
\
#### Retail & Restaurant\
\
Navigate dynamic retail markets with strategies aligned with your business goals, led by dedicated, relationship-driven specialists.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-retail-restaurant)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/677205e6881e6dd7c342d1aa_office.webp)\
\
#### Office Space\
\
Finding the right location for your business can be challenging. Let our expert agents simplify the process so you can get back to work.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-office)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/675b29b8470721741222a7a4_office1200.webp)\
\
#### Industrial\
\
Industrial leasing, sales, and acquisition requirements can be intricate processes. Our team meets your industrial property needs with precision, backed by responsive, solutions-oriented service.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-industrial)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/675b2a28ce563b716b262ad3_land1200.webp)\
\
#### Land\
\
From site selection to land assembly, our commercial land specialists offer data-driven insights to help you make informed investment decisions.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-land)

[All Listings →](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/commercial-listings)

### Hear from Our Clients

“Dick brought **years of valuable experience** in finding my newest HTeaO location. I do not need help finding sites that are already for sale. What I needed was someone to call and find unlisted properties that no one else might have thought about. He did just that, and we will be opening a new store in Claremore soon. I appreciate the work he did for us.”

![John Love](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675a7d20d9c29a50a934a48a/67630fd16747645d329463d8_john-love.webp)

John Love

Franchisee, HTeaO Tulsa

#### Hear from Our Clients

“I referred a client to Julie from Kansas City and at first glance, the sale appeared to be fairly straightforward. Due to unforeseen circumstances, the transaction became very difficult, but that did not deter Julie from **finding a solution for both parties** in order to get the transaction closed. Despite everything thrown at her, she had an incredible attitude and professionalism that **brought the parties together**.”

![Mike Levitan](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675a7d20d9c29a50a934a48a/67630f05655655bdd508c4bf_mike-levitan.webp)

Mike Levitan

Senior Vice President, Lane 4 Properties

#### Hear from Our Clients

“Burger King and Taco Bueno are powerful brands in Tulsa. Finding a location in downtown Tulsa that could support both brands under one roof was a real challenge for us. McGraw not only met that challenge, they **exceeded our expectations** by finding the right space in the perfect location.”

![Rick Verity](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675a7d20d9c29a50a934a48a/67630e8fe473c8e239ac0879_rick-verity.webp)

Rick Verity

CEO, Switchgrass Holdings LLC

2

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/677db41bfa6028341368aed7_mcp-logos.svg)

Latest from MCP
---------------

Get the latest market outlooks, trend reports, and MCP news.

[#### Tulsa Industrial Sale: MCP Completes 400,000 SF NNN Leaseback\
\
MCP completes a ±400,000 SF industrial/office sale and NNN leaseback in Tulsa, OK. Learn more about this major transaction and Tulsa industrial investment trends.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/news/major-industrial-office-transaction-completed-in-tulsa-ok)

[#### Tulsa Office Trends Report H1 2025\
\
A significant trend shaping the market is the ongoing shift toward hybrid work models and the rationalization of office footprints.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/news/tulsa-office-trends-report-h1-2025)

[#### Tulsa Industrial Trends Report H1 2025\
\
During the first half of 2025, the Tulsa industrial market demonstrated strong performance.](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/news/tulsa-industrial-trends-report-h1-2025)

[View All](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/blog)

data.markdown:
Office Space  
Real Estate
==========================

[Explore Properties](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/services-office#properties)
[Work With Us](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/677205e6881e6dd7c342d1aa_office.webp)

### Capitalizing on the ever-changing office market dynamics

[Let's Talk](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

#### For Landlords

Every property has its own unique traits and attributes which form its story.  We help you tell your story by leveraging our creative marketing strategies and deep local market expertise to highlight your property’s strengths. We understand emerging market trends and changing occupier needs and we position your property to attract tenants while achieving optimal rents that maximize building value.

#### For Tenants

Your leased space is an extension of your company’s brand which can influence customer perception and support employee performance and retention. We assist occupiers in making complex real estate decisions regarding their leased space. Our process begins with the evaluation of space requirements, identification of cost reductions, and identification of the tenant improvements cost, leading to an evaluation of the benefits of a renewal vs. relocation and nuanced lease negotiations. Our tenant leasing professionals support the goals of our occupier clients throughout the process, providing valuable insights and advice.

Services

### We provide insights and expertise that maximize value.

MCP delivers industry-leading services and strategies that support our clients' success in buying, selling, or leasing office space.

> — Landlord / seller representation  
> — Tailored marketing strategies / OM brochure development  
> — Tenant/ buyer representation  
> — Market Intelligence / Needs Assessment  
> — Location Analysis / Site searches  
> — Office market surveys and submarket analysis  
> — Opinion of value  
> — Consulting and research  
> — Property management

Office Space Properties
-----------------------

[Explore All Listings](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/commercial-listings)

### Hear from Our Clients

“I reached out to Julie with MCP several months ago with a proposition to sell a large building I had in Collinsville and **Julie and her team jumped into action**. We got pictures and went over options and before I knew it, we had prospective buyers making offers. Julie with **MCP will get the job done**. Julie was able to get what we were looking for on this particular piece of property and get it closed very quickly. I highly recommend her and the MCP team if you are looking to sell your commercial property.”

![Jimmy Davis](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)

Jimmy Davis

### Hear from Our Clients

“We were in a rush to find a property, and McGraw showed us properties, answered questions, and coordinated between us and the property management. They listened to us and **didn’t waste our time** by showing us properties that were unsuitable in space and/or budget. **I recommend the McGraw team without hesitation!**”

![Sandra Evans](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)

Office space is a reflection of a company’s brand and its corporate culture. Having the right office environment supports employee productivity while assisting in attracting and retaining top talent. data.markdown:
Tenant  
Representation
=======================

[Work With Us](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

Advocates for your business
---------------------------

Real estate is a dynamic and complicated industry. There are so many industry-related terms and market details that it is almost impossible for someone not actively involved with real estate to know everything. MCP is committed to finding and completing a lease at the best property for you, providing unbiased advice and advocacy during the leasing process.

[Let's Talk](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/6887f290995470e11df400c4_mcp-team.webp)

The MCP Process
===============

Unbiased advice and advocacy to find and complete a lease at the best property for you.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/676e12423e9ce49c0e8d192b_01_market_intelligence.svg)

Step 1

#### Market Intelligence

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/676e12424bfb795608e2fea7_02_needs.svg)

Step 2

#### Needs Assessment

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/676e12426bccc76f42772eff_03_evaluating.svg)

Step 3

#### Evaluating Options

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/676e12424ec247130c1d2c1a_04_assistance.svg)

Step 4

#### Assistance During the Lease

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/676e12424bb36d51ce9cb439_05_client.svg)

Step 5

#### Assistance During the Lease

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/676e1242768a65278ba9e3ad_06_securing.svg)

Step 6

#### Securing Space

Services

### We know both sides of the business.

As your representative, we advocate for you and provide expert services and current market information to assist you in making a sound business decision regarding your space requirements, location, and lease terms.

> — Preliminary Lease Reviews  
> — Financial Modeling  
> — Market Analysis  
> — Mapping & Demographics  
> — Strategic Planning  
> — Lease Administration  
> — Lease Negotiations  
> — Expansion & Consolidation Services  
> — Sublease Negotiations  
> — Business Needs Assessment  
> — Business Relocation  
> — Master Plan Development  
> — Construction & Project Management  
> — Facilities Management  
> — Benchmarking  
> — Market Research  
> — Economic Incentives  
> — Environmental Solutions  
> — Cost Segregation

MCP Delivers Comprehensive Solutions
------------------------------------

Not all real estate is created equal, and the space you choose for your organization can profoundly impact your business. At MCP, we take time to learn about your company and create long-term, comprehensive strategies that combine financial, business, and real estate objectives.

If you’re facing any of these challenging questions that many tenants have in common, we can help:

When a lease expiration is on the horizon, is renewing the best option? If so, what terms should be expected?

Should you consider moving to another market or submarket?

What are the pros and cons of owning versus leasing? Does a property acquisition best suit your needs?

When is subleasing space the best option? What are the benefits and risks?

Does a sale-leaseback transaction make sense?

If you are starting a new company, what is the right amount of space for your organization? Where is the best location based on your priorities?

If expansion is the next step, is space available at your current location? Are there more attractive alternatives?

If space consolidation is the best choice, how do you right-size most beneficially?

### Hear from Our Clients

“Working with McGraw's multifamily team has been an exceptional experience. As a buyer and a seller, **their in-depth market knowledge, transparent communication, and commitment to achieving the best outcomes have made every transaction seamless.** They consistently provide accurate data and valuable insights, ensuring **we feel confident in every decision**. Their integrity and dedication to building lasting relationships **set them apart** in the multifamily industry. I highly recommend McGraw's multifamily team to anyone looking for trusted, results-driven real estate professionals.”

![Shelby Oakley](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)

Shelby Oakley

Oakley Properties

#### Hear from Our Clients

“We were in a rush to find a property, and McGraw showed us properties, answered questions, and coordinated between us and the property management. They listened to us and **didn’t waste our time** by showing us properties that were unsuitable in space and/or budget. **I recommend the McGraw team without hesitation!**”

![Sandra Evans](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)

I appreciated how quickly Cindy responded to my calls, texts, and emails.

![Ryan Edwards](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)

Ryan Edwards

#### Hear from Our Clients

“Burger King and Taco Bueno are powerful brands in Tulsa. Finding a location in downtown Tulsa that could support both brands under one roof was a real challenge for us. McGraw not only met that challenge, they **exceeded our expectations** by finding the right space in the perfect location.”

data.markdown:
About MCP
=========

We’re a privately-owned, full-service commercial real estate firm offering unmatched local market knowledge and unwavering loyalty and commitment.

[Work With Us](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

Founded in Tulsa in 2008, we’ve built a reputation for delivering expertise, integrity, and results. Whether you’re buying, selling, or leasing, we approach every transaction with the care and commitment we offer family and friends.  
  
With over 200 years of combined experience and $1 billion in successful deals, our brokers bring firsthand knowledge of the market—and the process. Many of us have walked in your shoes, navigating the same challenges as investors and property owners. That’s why we prioritize your goals, offering honest advice and a personalized approach to simplify even the most complex decisions.  
  
Our flat management structure empowers us to act quickly and adapt to market changes without the bureaucracy of larger firms. Our in-house marketing and research teams create tailored strategies, high-quality materials, and insightful market trend reports, ensuring your property or investment opportunity is positioned to succeed.  
  
MCP thrives on a collaborative, entrepreneurial spirit that sets us apart. We’re not just a team—we’re a "we" culture. Our brokers and staff work together seamlessly, mentoring and supporting one another to deliver the best outcomes for our clients. When you work with one of us, you get the collective power of all of us.

[Let's Talk](https://www.mcgrawcp.com/contact)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/6887f290995470e11df400c4_mcp-team.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/675a68c25db07f6829baa189_drone-building.webp)

Driven by Values, United by Vision
----------------------------------

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/67634ca81a247fe1a865ba9c_icon-handshake.svg)

### Loyalty

At MCP, loyalty means standing by our clients, team, and community. We build lasting relationships based on mutual trust.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/67634ca845796d000178b2dc_icon-hill.svg)

### Tenacity

We don’t give up. MCP tackles challenges head-on, staying focused and driven to secure the best outcomes for our clients.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/67634ca84871c0c4725bf119_icon-together.svg)

### Commitment

Your goals are our goals. MCP is dedicated to delivering results with honesty, integrity, and your best interests at heart.

### Part of Something Bigger

We’re proud to be part of McGraw Davisson Stewart, a family of companies with a legacy of over 80 years in real estate. This includes McGraw Realtors, one of the nation’s fastest-growing residential real estate firms, and Winfield Property Management, managing over 5,400 multifamily units. Together, we offer clients a comprehensive suite of services that span the full spectrum of real estate needs.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6758c5fdcb72a01dfea7a348/677210a37ac2eea3ba673fbf_mcgraw-family.webp)

Andrew
======

Leach
=====

Senior Associate

![Leach](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675a7d20d9c29a50a934a48a/6760b85ad388a4191ee611b6_andrew-leach.webp)

### Andrew

### Leach

[aleach@mcgrawcp.com](mailto:aleach@mcgrawcp.com)

[+19728148093](tel:+19728148093)

Andrew joined McGraw Commercial Properties in 2021 specializing in the acquisition and disposition of land, in Tulsa and Northeast Oklahoma. Andrew is experienced with working closely with landowners, developers, lenders, and end-users. His focus on market fundamentals provides his clients with insights into current market conditions and prevailing trends that affect property values. By utilizing real-time market knowledge from current transactions, Andrew can position land assets in the market to achieve advantageous terms for his clients.

Andrew is originally from Houston Texas, He graduated from Texas State University with a Bachelor of Arts in Economics. Andrew enjoys saltwater fishing, camping, and skeet shooting. He is also a volunteer for the Gathering Place.

‍
